data.name: The Rewind Factory Demo
data.detailed_description: Play this free demo to try out the game. It includes 7 levels and access to the level editor
data.about_the_game: Play this free demo to try out the game. It includes 7 levels and access to the level editor
data.short_description: A software update fails and you end up in a test track. The only way out: complete the test track. You can rewind trough time, wall run, dash and slow time to complete the test chambers as fast a possible. Can you beat the fastest time in this FPS movement based game?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: i7-4710MQ 2.5GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 860M
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2.5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: These requirements may not be final
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: i5-10600K 4.1 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060-6GB
  • Storage: 2.5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: These requirements may not be final
